constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 48 (Thursday, March 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PFLUGER:
H.R. 7139.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article l, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United Sates
Constitution
[Page H3828]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Removing Arms from Terrorists Through Sanctions Act
